item.title: The Fed Could Wait Too Long for the Labor Market to Crack
item.description: The labor market is not as strong as it was a month ago.

item.title: Executive Recruiter Jana Rich Reflects on 10 Years of Bringing Diversity to Silicon Valley
item.description: What happens—or doesn’t happen—to DEI now?

item.title: Science Says Emotionally Intelligent People Refuse to Complain. Here’s Why
item.description: Express your feelings to reduce stress? Research shows complaining will often make you feel worse.

item.title: Walmart Just Made a Game-Changing Announcement, and Everyone Else Will Have to Play Catch-Up
item.description: I have seen the future, and it apparently involves ice cream and eggs delivered by a flying robot within 10 minutes.

item.title: Neuroscience Says Your Office Should Have a Dedicated Daydreaming Space
item.description: Investing in a quiet spot for letting people’s mind run free for a while will pay off in greater happiness, creativity, and even productivity.
